metaslider_-type-_slider_anchor_attribut.name: metaslider_{$type}_slider_anchor_attributes
metaslider_-type-_slider_anchor_attribut.summary: Use this filter to modify or add attributes to each slide anchor (link) tag. {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo.

type.label: type
type.description: {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo

attributes.label: attributes
attributes.description: Default image attributes (eg width, height, src).

metaslider_-type-_slider_image_attribute.name: metaslider_{$type}_slider_image_attributes
metaslider_-type-_slider_image_attribute.summary: Use this filter to modify or add attributes to each slide image tag. {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo.

type.label: type
type.description: {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo

attributes.label: attributes
attributes.description: Default image attributes (eg width, height, src).

metaslider_-type-_slider_javascript.name: metaslider_{$type}_slider_javascript
metaslider_-type-_slider_javascript.summary: Use this filter to add javascript below (after) the slider JavaScript call. {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo.

type.label: type
type.description: {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo

metaslider_-type-_slider_javascript_befo.name: metaslider_{$type}_slider_javascript_before
metaslider_-type-_slider_javascript_befo.summary: Use this filter to add javascript before the slider JavaScript call. {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo.

type.label: type
type.description: {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo

metaslider_-type-_slider_parameters.name: metaslider_{$type}_slider_parameters
metaslider_-type-_slider_parameters.summary: Use this filter to modify the JavaScript properties used to initiate the slideshow. {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo.
metaslider_-type-_slider_parameters.description:
MetaSlider exposes most of each slideshows options in the slideshow settings, but there are some specialist options that are offered by each slideshow library that you cannot change through the MetaSlider interface. This filter allows you to change existing properties or add new ones.

For a full list of available properties, see Flex Slider Properties, Nivo Slider Properties (scroll down to ‘Play with settings’), Coin Slider Properties (scroll down to ‘List of all options’), Responsive Slides Properties (scroll down to ‘Options you can customise’)

  • To create/alter an integer property value, omit quotes
  • To create/alter a string property value, use single or double quotes
  • To create or add to a function, assign the value to an array (see first example)

type.label: type
type.description: {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo

metaslider_capability.name: metaslider_capability
metaslider_capability.summary: Use this filter to modify the user capability required to use MetaSlider. The default capability is ‘edit_others_posts’.
metaslider_capability.description: You can change the required capability to any default capability included in WordPress.

metaslider_default_parameters.name: metaslider_default_parameters
metaslider_default_parameters.summary: Use this filter to modify the default slideshow settings. Theme developers may wish to use this to automatically set a ‘recommended’ slideshow size.

metaslider_hoplink.name: metaslider_hoplink
metaslider_hoplink.summary: Use this filter to modify the URL used in the “Go Pro” links throughout MetaSlider. This is for use by theme developers who have signed up as an affiliate.

link.label: link
link.description: The URL used to direct users to www.metaslider.com from all “Go Pro” links within the MetaSlider interface.

metaslider_image_-type-_slider_markup.name: metaslider_image_{$type}_slider_markup
metaslider_image_-type-_slider_markup.summary: This filter allows you to modify the complete slide HTML generated by MetaSlider. {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo.

type.label: type
type.description: {type} can be flex, coin, responsive or nivo

html.label: html
html.description: HTML markup for the complete slide

metaslider_post_feed_args.name: metaslider_post_feed_args
metaslider_post_feed_args.summary: Use this filter to modify the query arguments used to extract posts in a Post Feed slide.

args.label: args
args.description: WP_Query arguments as defined by the slide settings

metaslider_resized_image_url.name: metaslider_resized_image_url
metaslider_resized_image_url.summary: Use this filter to modify the slide image URL used by MetaSlider. For example, it could be used to change the full image URL to a relative image URL.

cropped_url.label: cropped_url
cropped_url.description: The URL to the cropped/resized image (e.g. http://[…]/image-150x150.jpg)

orig_url.label: orig_url
orig_url.description: The URL to the full size image (e.g.  http://[…]/image.jpg)
